auth.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmailInstructions: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
auth.resetPasswordSuccessInstructions: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password.
auth.enterYourPhone: Enter your phone number to continue
auth.phoneLoginDescription: We'll send a verification code to your phone
auth.unifiedLoginSubtitle: Sign in or create an account to continue

errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.registrationFailed: Registration failed. Please check your information and try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

success.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
validation.invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.acceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

phoneVerification.enterPhoneDescription: We'll send you a verification code to confirm your number
phoneVerification.verifyCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to {phone}
phoneVerification.verificationSuccessDescription: Your phone has been verified. Let's continue setting up your account.

category.title: What type of business do you have?

businessInfo.title: Business Information
businessInfo.subtitle: Tell us about your business
businessInfo.phoneHint: This will be your primary contact number

location.title: Business Location
location.subtitle: Where is your business located?

location.sharedLocationHint: Clients will see your exact location on the map

hours.title: Business Hours
hours.subtitle: Set your working hours
hours.note: You can customize hours for specific services later

services.title: Your Services

assistance.title: How Can We Help?
assistance.subtitle: Select areas where you'd like assistance (select up to 5)

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.subtitle: Your provider profile is complete
